abstract: Carl Icahn said Wednesday that 12.5 percent of Lions Gate Entertainment’s shares were tendered after his $7 a share offer, effectively giving him a 31 percent stake in the studio he has criticized for being poorly managed, Reuters reported.
snippet: Carl Icahn said Wednesday that 12.5 percent of Lions Gate Entertainment’s shares were tendered after his $7 a share offer, effectively giving him a 31 percent stake in the studio he has criticized for being poorly managed, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Carl Icahn said on Wednesday that 12.5 percent of Lions Gate Entertainment‘s shares were tendered after his $7 a share offer, effectively giving him a 31 percent stake in the studio he has criticized for being poorly managed, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Icahn Says Lions Gate Stake Reaches 31%
